verbs.description: [ARG0: sony] [V: makes] [ARG1: no concessions to eu regulators in emi music bid] brussels oct 22- sony corp has not offered concessions to european union antitrust regulators reviewing its 2 3 billion offer for control of emi to become the world largest music publisher the european commission website showed on monday the deadline for proposed concessions in the european commission preliminary assessment of the deal was oct 19 yun chee ceo emi executive european commission pharrell williams eu sony brussels european union michael jackson publisher alexander smith songwriter alliance kenichiro yoshida drake sam smith sam smith sportswriter reuters sony corp emi music mubadala investment co
